snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said Monday that he was looking for less costly alternatives to his weekend travel from Washington to his walnut farm in Carmel Valley, Calif.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta says that he is looking for less expensive alternatives to his travel most weekends from Washington to his walnut farm in Carmel Valley, Calif, which costs taxpayers close to $32,000 per trip; Panetta is required to travel on military aircraft so he can remain in constant contact with the White House.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said Monday that he was looking for less costly alternatives to his weekend travel from Washington to his walnut farm in Carmel Valley, Calif.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
